title: 12 Must-Try Nail Colors Trending for Spring
description: These mood-boosting shades are totally unexpected.
excerpt: These mood-boosting shades are totally unexpected.
text: If winter and cold temperatures have you feeling down, don’t underestimate the power of refreshing your nails. As we look forward to warmer temperatures and blooming flowers, dopamine-inducing spring nail colors can instantly brighten your mood.Many of this season’s best nail color trends are both wearable and delightfully unexpected. In the springtime, you might predict pastels and floral-inspired colors to rise in popularity. This year, however, the trending spring nail colors are bolder, brighter, and more exciting. Think fiery reds, splashy blues, and even warm browns alongside more expected hues like lavender and pink. These nail colors take a cue from Fall/Winter 2025 runway shows and the spring fashions. To find out next season’s best nail colors, we consulted celebrity manicurist Elle Gerstein, Nailing Hollywood artist Hang Nguyen, editorial nail artist Jin Soon Choi, KISS ambassador Gina Edwards, and CND co-founder and style director Jan Arnold. Keep reading for the best nail colors to cycle through all season long—we promise you won’t be bored.Fiery RedsJinsoon Nail Polish in CoquetteCredit: JinsoonOPI Nail Lacquer in Big Apple RedCredit: OPISally Hansen Insta-Dri Nail Polish in Augmented-Red-alityCredit: Sally HansenThe color red has steadily been taking over our clothes, hair, and beauty products, and it’s showing no signs of slowing down. Looking to the runways, Choi says that two different finishes will be big this spring. You can opt for a red jelly with a light or translucent finish like Choi selected for the Brandon Maxwell SS2024 runway, or you can try a quintessential classic red, which Choi did at the Proenza Schouler SS2024 runway. Baby BluesEssie Nail Polish in Bikini So TeenyCredit: EssieMorgan Taylor Nail Lacquer in Water Baby Credit: Morgan TaylorGucci Glossy Nail Polish in 716 Lucy Baby Blue If you loved the “blueberry milk” nails that dominated last spring, powder blue nails are set to take over this year. “Soft pastels are dopamine enhancing,” says Gerstein, noting that baby blue, in particular, is universally flattering across skin tones. Nguyen agrees that the soft hue will be a big trend this spring. “I love this shade because it’s like wearing a piece of the sky on your nails,” she says. “It gives off a calm and sunny vibe, just like springtime.”Sheer PinksCirque Colors Nail Polish in Rose JellyCredit: Cirque ColorsJinsoon Nail Polish in PixieCredit: JinsoonOPI Nail Lacquer in Bubble BathCredit: OPI“A classic and timeless choice that adds a delicate touch to any look,” Choi says of sheer pink. A peekaboo pink nail polish is versatile for every situation—you can wear it anywhere, from work to a wedding. Its classic nature makes it the perfect color to reach for this spring. Canary YellowOPI Nail Lacquer in Stay Out All BrightCredit: OPIChanel Le Vernis in 129 OvniCredit: ChanelOlive and June Nail Polish in Bright & FocusedCredit: Olive and JuneWhen choosing a new nail color, bright yellow might not always come to mind as a wearable choice. This spring, however, the sunny shade will be a major trend. “It can be an instant mood booster,” says Gerstein. Wear it on every finger, or just use it as a statement-making accent shade. LavenderEssie Nail Polish in LilacismCredit: essie Addiction Tokyo The Nail Polish in Twilight SongCredit: Addiction Tokyo CND Vinylux in Chic-A-Delic Credit: CNDNguyen says that lavender is the perfect transitional shade from winter to spring, especially since it’s versatile while still offering a sense of playfulness. Opt for a creamy, opaque version of the shade or a holographic sparkle to add even more intrigue. BeigeCND Vinylux Longwear Nail Polish in Field FoxCredit: CNDDior Vernis in 206 Gris Dior Credit: DiorDeborah Lippmann Nail Polish in FashionCredit: Deborah Lippmann“Versatile and understated, nude beige shades offer a chic and polished look that never goes out of style,” says Choi. While the shade is a timeless classic, it was also all over the Marc Jacobs FW2024 runway, cementing it as a major upcoming trend. Mint GreenOPI Nail Lacquer in That's Hula-rious!Essie Gel Couture 2-Step Longwear Nail Polish in Zip Me UpCredit: EssieElla+Mila Nail Polish in PistacheCredit: Ella+MilaWhen I think of mint green, I envision the loud chevron patterns of the 2010s. This season’s hue is much more subdued—think dusty pastel green rather than seafoam. Nguyen calls this color another “instant mood booster.” Forest GreenLakur Enhanced Colour by Londontown in VibeCredit: LakurCND Vinylux Longwear Nail Polish in AuraNow 11% OffCredit: CNDSally Hansen Color Therapy Nail Polish in Serene Green Now 25% OffCredit: Sally HansenForest green nail polish may seem like a wintery choice, but Gerstein argues that it’s a natural neutral shade. Since it’s such a prevalent color in nature, this deep hue works to ground your manicure. Mermaid blueDeborah Lippmann Gel Lab Pro Nail Polish in Galaxy Far Far Awayessie Nail Art Studio Special Effects Nail Polish in Gilded Galaxyessie Nail Art Studio Special Effects Nail Polish in Mystic MarineNow 24% OffBold color statements are making an appearance in a major way this spring. One color we can’t wait to put on our nails is sparkling, aqua blue. “The vibrant and bold nature of aqua blue shimmer makes it a standout choice for the spring season, embodying an eclectic yet understated look,” says Arnold.Barbie ChromeCND Shellac in CovetableMorgan Taylor Nail Lacquer in Tutti FruttiOPI Nail Lacquer in 15 Minutes of FlameHot pink nails will have a moment this spring. “Fuchsia is a bold and eye-catching shade, perfect for spring,” says Arnold. “It’s gorgeous with pink glitter. This color embodies sophistication with an energetic spirit, making it a gorgeous choice for the spring season.”Gilded Addiction Tokyo The Nail Polish + in Moonlight StoryChanel Le Vernis Longwear Nail Colour in PhénixDior Vernis in J'adoreGlittering, eye-catching gold nails go with everything, just like gold jewelry. “Gold shimmer is a versatile and elegant choice for spring,” says Arnold. “It adds a touch of luxury and sophistication to any nail design.”AmberLondontown Lakur Nail Polish in Posh Forever Essie Nail Polish in Not So Silent NightOPI Infinite Shine Long-Wear Lacquer in StunstoppableWarm brown tones are the perfect neutral nail color to choose this spring. According to Edwards, amber is the perfect color to reach for when you want to add a little intrigue to a nude manicure.
html:
If winter and cold temperatures have you feeling down, don’t underestimate the power of refreshing your nails. As we look forward to warmer temperatures and blooming flowers, dopamine-inducing spring nail colors can instantly brighten your mood.

Many of this season’s best nail color trends are both wearable and delightfully unexpected. In the springtime, you might predict pastels and floral-inspired colors to rise in popularity. This year, however, the trending spring nail colors are bolder, brighter, and more exciting. Think fiery reds, splashy blues, and even warm browns alongside more expected hues like lavender and pink. These nail colors take a cue from Fall/Winter 2025 runway shows and the spring fashions.

To find out next season’s best nail colors, we consulted celebrity manicurist Elle Gerstein, Nailing Hollywood artist Hang Nguyen, editorial nail artist Jin Soon Choi, KISS ambassador Gina Edwards, and CND co-founder and style director Jan Arnold. Keep reading for the best nail colors to cycle through all season long—we promise you won’t be bored.

Fiery Reds

Jinsoon Nail Polish in Coquette

OPI Nail Lacquer in Big Apple Red

Sally Hansen Insta-Dri Nail Polish in Augmented-Red-ality

The color red has steadily been taking over our clothes, hair, and beauty products, and it’s showing no signs of slowing down. Looking to the runways, Choi says that two different finishes will be big this spring. You can opt for a red jelly with a light or translucent finish like Choi selected for the Brandon Maxwell SS2024 runway, or you can try a quintessential classic red, which Choi did at the Proenza Schouler SS2024 runway.

Baby Blues

Essie Nail Polish in Bikini So Teeny

Morgan Taylor Nail Lacquer in Water Baby

Gucci Glossy Nail Polish in 716 Lucy Baby Blue

If you loved the “blueberry milk” nails that dominated last spring, powder blue nails are set to take over this year. “Soft pastels are dopamine enhancing,” says Gerstein, noting that baby blue, in particular, is universally flattering across skin tones.

Nguyen agrees that the soft hue will be a big trend this spring. “I love this shade because it’s like wearing a piece of the sky on your nails,” she says. “It gives off a calm and sunny vibe, just like springtime.”

Sheer Pinks

Cirque Colors Nail Polish in Rose Jelly

Jinsoon Nail Polish in Pixie

OPI Nail Lacquer in Bubble Bath

“A classic and timeless choice that adds a delicate touch to any look,” Choi says of sheer pink. A peekaboo pink nail polish is versatile for every situation—you can wear it anywhere, from work to a wedding. Its classic nature makes it the perfect color to reach for this spring.

Canary Yellow

OPI Nail Lacquer in Stay Out All Bright

Chanel Le Vernis in 129 Ovni

Olive and June Nail Polish in Bright & Focused

When choosing a new nail color, bright yellow might not always come to mind as a wearable choice. This spring, however, the sunny shade will be a major trend. “It can be an instant mood booster,” says Gerstein. Wear it on every finger, or just use it as a statement-making accent shade.

Lavender

Essie Nail Polish in Lilacism

Addiction Tokyo The Nail Polish in Twilight Song

CND Vinylux in Chic-A-Delic

Nguyen says that lavender is the perfect transitional shade from winter to spring, especially since it’s versatile while still offering a sense of playfulness. Opt for a creamy, opaque version of the shade or a holographic sparkle to add even more intrigue.

Beige

CND Vinylux Longwear Nail Polish in Field Fox

Dior Vernis in 206 Gris Dior

Deborah Lippmann Nail Polish in Fashion

“Versatile and understated, nude beige shades offer a chic and polished look that never goes out of style,” says Choi. While the shade is a timeless classic, it was also all over the Marc Jacobs FW2024 runway, cementing it as a major upcoming trend.

Mint Green

OPI Nail Lacquer in That's Hula-rious!

Essie Gel Couture 2-Step Longwear Nail Polish in Zip Me Up

Ella+Mila Nail Polish in Pistache

When I think of mint green, I envision the loud chevron patterns of the 2010s. This season’s hue is much more subdued—think dusty pastel green rather than seafoam. Nguyen calls this color another “instant mood booster.”

Forest Green

Lakur Enhanced Colour by Londontown in Vibe

CND Vinylux Longwear Nail Polish in Aura

Now 11% Off

Sally Hansen Color Therapy Nail Polish in Serene Green

Now 25% Off

Forest green nail polish may seem like a wintery choice, but Gerstein argues that it’s a natural neutral shade. Since it’s such a prevalent color in nature, this deep hue works to ground your manicure.

Mermaid blue

Deborah Lippmann Gel Lab Pro Nail Polish in Galaxy Far Far Away

essie Nail Art Studio Special Effects Nail Polish in Gilded Galaxy

essie Nail Art Studio Special Effects Nail Polish in Mystic Marine

Now 24% Off

Bold color statements are making an appearance in a major way this spring. One color we can’t wait to put on our nails is sparkling, aqua blue. “The vibrant and bold nature of aqua blue shimmer makes it a standout choice for the spring season, embodying an eclectic yet understated look,” says Arnold.

Barbie Chrome

CND Shellac in Covetable

Morgan Taylor Nail Lacquer in Tutti Frutti

OPI Nail Lacquer in 15 Minutes of Flame

Hot pink nails will have a moment this spring. “Fuchsia is a bold and eye-catching shade, perfect for spring,” says Arnold. “It’s gorgeous with pink glitter. This color embodies sophistication with an energetic spirit, making it a gorgeous choice for the spring season.”

Gilded

Addiction Tokyo The Nail Polish + in Moonlight Story

Chanel Le Vernis Longwear Nail Colour in Phénix

Dior Vernis in J'adore

Glittering, eye-catching gold nails go with everything, just like gold jewelry. “Gold shimmer is a versatile and elegant choice for spring,” says Arnold. “It adds a touch of luxury and sophistication to any nail design.”

Amber

Londontown Lakur Nail Polish in Posh Forever

Essie Nail Polish in Not So Silent Night

OPI Infinite Shine Long-Wear Lacquer in Stunstoppable

Warm brown tones are the perfect neutral nail color to choose this spring. According to Edwards, amber is the perfect color to reach for when you want to add a little intrigue to a nude manicure.
